title: Any permitted non-conforming uses or those existing prior to 01
clause_text: Any permitted non-conforming uses or those existing prior to 01.04.1962 including industries which are nonhazardous or nonpolluting may be allowed to continue without addition to such non- conforming use

source_pdf.text_snippet: Any permitted non-conforming uses or those existing prior to 01.04.1962 including industries which are nonhazardous or nonpolluting may be allowed to continue without addition to such non- conforming
